page.title: 07Blockley Garage
page.content: Jason and John interviewed Mr. Stuart-Turner about his garage. We asked him why did he open a garage a he replied that when he was younger he was very interested in motor cars. He opened a garage in Blockley because the premises were near his home and at a price he could afford. Mr Stuart Turner thinks that Blockley is a very pleasant place to live but from a business point of view there is not a lot of passing traffic. The garage opens at 8.30am and closes at 6.pm but a lot of work is done when the garage is closed to the public and Mr Stuart -Turner sometimes doesn't finish his work until very late at night but he likes his job.
